attributes.action:
Bring back the UK death penalty
Lethal injection for murderers and pedophiles
attributes.additional_details:
Life imprisonment costs tax payer 
on average £30K each year per 
Prisoner which is a lot of money. 
The Prisoners sit about cell and watch TV while getting well fed 
and it costs hundreds million pounds
to imprison them for a life time this is the reasons I think Britain has become too soft now 

Not all Prisoners can be rehabilitated
and the ones that can't should be punished to death for there crimes 
Such as terrorism and murder 
It would be more cost effective 
for our over crowded prisons
attributes.background:
A year on from the Manchester 
one love concert where 
innocent people got killed 
through a sick terror attack 
Bring back death penalty
This punishment in our country 
would soon stamp out terrorists
and people planning the attacks 
Same should be applied to 
Murderer and pedophiles

rejection.details: We think this petition is similar: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/214721
